name: Forward To Victory
description:
Read me, please  !

Got no time? Ok!

  • HOW TO PLAY

WASD - movement

Left mouse - shoot

Right mouse - grenade (u got 2)

Q - switch weapon (in this version u can use only 4)

E - get in vehicle (it's available future but not in this build... I have to fix somthing... So why do I type it ... )

  • GAMEPLAY

(just) Top-down shooter (currently)

  • PLOT?

Squad A is on mission to scout base of organization B (let's call em so for now). Their plain gets destroyed by air defense B before it gets to the base B. And so the main character have to conquer base B all by himself.

Here comes some current build screenshots:
